title: [BUG] Poro Rider Sejuani Splash art does not show on loading screen
body:
I noticed this happen last night, but i was too exhausted to think to much about it. I happened again when i played a game today.

Poro Rider Sejuani Skin is selected and applied at champion select and the skin is applied in game, however the splash art does not show correctly on the loading screen and instead shows the Default Sejuani splash art instead.

http://imgur.com/OIPhoAL

http://imgur.com/jUk1eGR

http://imgur.com/gasCjpG

replies.body:
Hey Alexavis - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating. ^-^
